inclusion.criterion: clinical diagnosis of acute asthma exacerbations
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Spirometry was performed revealing a forced expiratory volume in the first second (FEV1) of 63% of the predicted.

inclusion.criterion: information and written consent of a legal representative
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Chronic lung diseases other than asthma (cystic fibrosis, bronchopulmonary Dysplasia)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 39-year-old man came to the clinic with cough and shortness of breath that was not relieved by his inhaler. He had these symptoms for 5 days during the past 2 weeks.
